content.text: Harix was a planet in the Colonies with a considerable Rebel cell. Luke Skywalker was delivering some pre-Imperial micro-books to the Myoris' Rebel-friendly school on Harix when Darth Vader's underling, Major Rahz, captured the school's teacher, Myoris Lin, and a number of students. Darth Vader held Myoris and the children captive as bait for a trap for the Rebels in the Talhu Slotted Peaks. Skywalker was able to defeat Rahz, and freed the captured students.
